data.title: PM Modi silences skeptics with a hard-hitting interview in Newsweek Magazine
data.meta_description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, in one of his most important interviews to New York based magazine the Newsweek, emphasised how he is motivated to make the lives of every Indian, whom he considers his family. PM Modi, only the second Prime Minister after late Indira Gandhi to be featured on Newsweek magazine, dismisses question on discrimination on religious minorities and said even Indian minorities don’t buy this narrative anymore.
data.text: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, in one of his most important interviews to New York based magazine the Newsweek, emphasised how he is motivated to make the lives of every Indian, whom he considers his family. PM Modi, only the second Prime Minister after late Indira Gandhi to be featured on Newsweek magazine, dismisses question on discrimination on religious minorities and said even Indian minorities don’t buy this narrative anymore.
